short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: FloralNewTab: Blooming flowers, calendar, and your choice of search engine in one beautiful, tranquil new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: FloralNewTab enhances your browsing experience with a personalized tab that blends floral beauty with practical features. Every time you open a new tab, you'll be greeted by blooming flowers and have access to a calendar. Additionally, enjoy the flexibility of choosing your favorite search engine among options like Google, Bing, and DuckDuckGo, all from the comfort of your new tab. Beautify your web journey with the tranquility of FloralNewTab.
